title: Alms For Jihad Charity And Terrorism In The Islamic World J Mill
description:
Read the Book the Saudis Tried to Ban: "Alms for Jihad"

Thanks to the ruling family of Saudi Arabia you can no longer buy "Alms for Jihad", which recounts how Islamic charities, many of them with deep ties to the House of Saud, fund terrorism.

Here is more info on this book : http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alms_for_Jihad

Please download this file, READ IT,  and seed it as much as you can !

If they want to make us dhimmis, they really are going to have to find something other than the British courts to pound us into submission.
